transcript.text: Don’t be afraid to ask questions. And if you ever see something that could put our intellectual property at risk, report it.

panelText.text:
If you have any questions about Intellectual Property or how to protect Johnson Controls’ Intellectual Property:
  • consult the Johnson Controls’ Intellectual Property Policy
  • contact one of Johnson Controls’ Intellectual Property attorneys in the Law department for guidance

If you witness or suspect any non-compliance with Intellectual Property law or Johnson Controls policies, you have a duty to report it. You can:
  • tell your manager, the Law or Compliance team
  • call or log the concern on the Johnson Controls Integrity Helpline

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to return to the Home menu.
